item.title: NFS-Volume for K8S
item.description: 环境 Alma：Linux Alma 8.5 CP/Worker：ubuntu 18.04 NFS安装 Alma： #安装 yum install -y nfs-utils #nfs主节点 echo "/nfs/data/ *(insecure,rw,sync,no_root_squash)" > /etc/exports mkdir -p /nfs/data systemctl enable rpcbind --now systemctl enable nfs-server
